name: $15 Shopping Voucher
description: Use this voucher to get $15 off your next purchase at participating stores. Perfect for general shopping or dining.

name: ActiveSG 1-Day Pass
description: Receive a free day pass to any ActiveSG facility for access to gym and sports amenities.

name: ActiveSG 1-Month Pass
description: Get a 1-month membership to ActiveSG facilities, including access to gyms, pools, and sports amenities.

name: $10 McDonald's Voucher
description: Enjoy a $10 discount on your next meal at McDonald's. Redeemable at any participating location.

name: $10 Grab Voucher
description: Use this $10 Grab voucher for your next ride or food delivery, applicable on the Grab app.

name: Wingstop 3-Piece Chicken Tenders
description: Enjoy a free 3-piece order of juicy, flavorful chicken tenders in your favorite Wingstop flavor.

name: Wingstop 6-Piece Wings
description: Redeem a free 6-piece order of classic or boneless wings in your choice of any Wingstop flavor.

name: Wingstop Large Fries
description: Get a free large order of Wingstop's seasoned fries, crispy on the outside and fluffy inside.
